Episodes.Title: By the Beach/Swim Like a Fish
Episodes.Plot:
This is the first episode from the TV series season Lights, Camera, Action, Wiggles.  It has a new intro from a studio, and many regular segments.

This one was mainly about the Beach.  

Song List
"Romp bomp a stomp"
"Camera One"
"The Monkey Dance"
"Lights, Camera, Action, Wiggles"
"Hats"
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Episode 2
Episodes.Plot:
It's another episode from Network Wiggles.  The opening song is "Music with Murray".  In the News, Dorothy rides with some kids on a ferryboat.  Captain Feathersword predicts it's raining cats and dogs, and the mascots play a game of Pentagne (lawn bowling).  In Anthony's Workshop, the children make paper butterflies.

Song List:
"Music with Murray"
"Rolling down the sand hills / 
Running up the sand hills"
"C'est Wags, C'est Bon"
"Dressing up with style"
"Testing 1, 2, 3"
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Farm Animals/Fishing Time
Episodes.Plot:
This episode of Network Wiggles is mainly about Musical Instruments.  The opening song is "Rock-a-bye your bear".  In Network Wiggles News, Dorothy visits an animal farm.  Captain predicts a flurry of feathers.  The mascots do some cycling.

Anthony builds a fishing setup, Murray introduces a bunch of instruments to the kids, and Jeff falls asleep in the Sydney Orchestra..

Song List:
"Rock a bye your bear"
"Caveland"
"Wiggle Bay"
"Vegetable Soup"
"Swim like a Fish"
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: We're Building!/Garden Fun
Episodes.Plot:
This episode of Network Wiggles has skits that involve gardening and a couple of songs featuring the purple Wiggle, Jeff!  Dorothy visits a preschool, Captain Feathersword predicts a fluttering of butterflies, and the mascots play soccer.

Song List:
"Wake up, Jeff!"
"Where's Jeff?"
"Gulp Gulp"
"Hot Potato"
"Let's make some rosy tea"
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Episode 5
Episodes.Plot:
Starts with "Bit by Bit".  Dorothy visits a Ballet Class, Captain predicts it's raining umbrellas.  The mascots play croquet, and Anthony's Workshop the kids are making things out of dough.  

Song List:
"Bit by Bit"
"Toot Toot"
"Let's have a barbie on the beach"
"Haba Naba Nuwe"
"Rolling down the sandhills / 
Running up the sandhills"
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
